name: Evelyn MORGANSTEIN, Executrix of the Last Will and Testament of Morton Morganstein, Deceased, v. Benjamin HOUSE, M.D., Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Evelyn MORGANSTEIN, Executrix of the Last Will and Testament of Morton Morganstein, Deceased, v. Benjamin HOUSE, M.D., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as. having been improvidently granted.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
FLAHERTY and CAPPY, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stanley P. Stahl, Allan C. Molotsky, Barbara S. Magen, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Keith S. Erbstein, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
581 A.2d 1377
Evelyn MORGANSTEIN, Executrix of the Last Will and Testament of Morton Morganstein, Deceased, v. Benjamin HOUSE, M.D., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1990.
Decided Nov. 9, 1990.
Stanley P. Stahl, Allan C. Molotsky, Barbara S. Magen, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Keith S. Erbstein, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
